sentence.Network_en: This isn't the first hare-brained scheme he's had.
sentence.Network_cn: 这已经不是他制定的第一个愚蠢方案了。

sentence.Network_en: I'm told you have again done a mad - brained action.
sentence.Network_cn: 我听说你又做出了狂热的举动.

sentence.Network_en: One of these races was of a wary high type indeed ; it was tall and big - brained.
sentence.Network_cn: 其中一个人种实际上非常高级, 他们身材高大,脑容量大.

PerfectNetExp.abs: do you believe that you are more right brained ( creative , random ) , or left brained ( logical , mathematical ) ?你是用右脑多（创造力)还是左脑多（逻辑数学)。
He has hare - brained ideas and to my disgust all my colleagues are kowtowing to him ., 他的想法轻率浮躁 , 而且令我厌恶的是 , 我所有的同事都拍他马屁.

list.abs: 四、脑部肿瘤（Brain tumor）引起的头痛五、颞动脉炎（Temporal arteritis）引起的头痛六、鼻窦炎（Inflamed sinuses）引起的疼痛 …
脑干(brain stem)上接大脑、背靠小脑、尾侧与脊髓相连、前侧依次分为中脑、脑桥、延髓。小脑和脑干所夹空间称为第四脑室。

群尸玩过界(braindead)……《魔戒》导演彼得?杰克逊早期作品死亡航班(flightofthelivingdead:outbreakonaplane)……空中版《生化危 …

entry.tran: （用于名词后构成形容词）表示“头脑（不好）的”
entry.def: You can combine -brained with nouns to form adjectives which describe the quality of someone's mind when you consider that person to be rather stupid.

auth_sentence.content: One, Philippe is a pea-brained, yellow-livered imbecile.
auth_sentence.res_content: One, Philippe is a pea-brained, yellow-livered imbecile.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One, Philippe is a pea-brained, yellow-livered imbecile.

auth_sentence.content: Some people are left-brained; others are right-brained.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some people are left-brained; others are right-brained.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some people are left-brained; others are right-brained.
